moves.1. e4 e5 2. d4 exd4 3. Qxd4 Nc6 4. Qd5: I decide to put my queen on the attack...
moves.4... Nf6 5. Qd3: ...bit retreat her as the knight attacks.
moves.8. Qe3: My queen needs to move again.
moves.8... a6 9. Nf3 Neg4: That knight is sure being given the runaround.
moves.22... Bc6: It looks as thought I'm going to lose a rook, but...
moves.23. Re5+: this move allows me to save both.
moves.32. Kd2 Re5: Was this really a good idea?
moves.34. Ke3 g6 35. fxg6+ Kxg6 36. Ke4 Kf6 37: My next move would have been hxg5+, and possibly the response would be Kxg5 and mine Kxe5, but my numerical pawn advantage told.
